author: Z.B. Steele
description:
A.C. Cobble’s Conspiracy is a multi-POV epic fantasy with dragons in the skies, whispers on the wind, and daggers in the shadows. Trope-filled but razor sharp, Conspiracy is the first book in a dark, epic series that goes back to the roots of fantasy while still keeping things fresh. “The conspirators involved in this plot […]

title: REVIEW: Conspiracy by A.C. Cobble
